FROM alpine:3.11
COPY requirements.txt /
RUN apk add -U --no-cache \
    python3 \
    python3-dev \
    musl-dev \
    git \
    openssh \
    git-fast-import \
    bash \
    gcc \
    diffutils \
  && pip3 install --no-cache-dir -r /requirements.txt
